des:
Do you need an extra pair of hands to help you with tasks like getting your home ready for your party? The playlist needs to be set up and the right lighting selected to set the mood, but you’re still cooking dinner? Have you ever wished you could turn on the lights at night when you come home with your arms full of groceries?

Life just got easier; just ask Alexa to help by saying a command.

When using the LEEDARSON application and Alexa, you will have the flexibility and convenience of voice control.

It’s easy to get started. Simply tap the “Enable” button in the Alexa App to link your LEEDARSON account and say, “Alexa, discover devices” 

With the LEEDARSON smart home application, you can add a device, create lighting scenes or create custom room settings.
Add connected devices such as: bulbs, outlets, dimmers, and switches
Create custom mood or event scenes such as: Relax, Party, Dinner, Watch TV, etc.
Create Rooms for group control such as: Bedroom, Kitchen, Family Room, etc.

After adding a new device, or creating a Scene or Room, simply ask “Alexa, discover devices” to have them work with the Amazon Alexa.

Here are some examples of voice control commands for your smart home devices; as simple as 3 easy steps:
1. Discover device
2. Set
3. Use
Note: Currently the LEEDARSON Skill for Alexa can be used to control Leedarson smart bulbs, switches, dimmers, outlets and sensors. Some products may need the LEEDARSON gateway to act as a bridge. For more compatible devices please visit www.leedarson.con or contact your sales team.
